name: Morning Coffee | Утренний кофе
description:
What could brighten up the beginning of a busy day for the head of a small logistics company? Why not start with coffee.

The game for the #inkJam21. Short and quick.

This is the English translation of the early Russian game by the same author: https://cheshiren.github.io/MorningCoffee/

Author of the image in the cover: Filippo Diotalevi. Used under license CC BY 2.0 with some color changes.
